title: [LFT] Plat 5 JG main, can top/sup
body:
Looking for a team. As the title says, I main jungle but can also top and support. I don't enjoy playing solo queue as much anymore and have resorted to smurfs recently as people are way too toxic and it ruins the experience.

Add me in-game: Test

replies.body:
Here's the thread on what I'm looking for:
http://www.reddit.com/r/TeamRedditTeams/comments/2ov2qx/ocessplatlf_teamsr/ 

I did add you. IGN: Krylo
PM me in-client :)
